comments.raw_text: Apparently an important use case for games.
comments.text: Apparently an important use case for games.

comments.raw_text: While true, it's worth mentioning that a similar API for Canvas would be great, as more and more game developers jump to Canvas directly. Pointer-events only work for DOM based games.
